pr_title: [ISSUE#4355] Do not retry distro sync again if member has removed.

timeline.message: Do not retry distro sync again if member has removed.

timeline.bodyText: And can we transfer a static method to check targetServer  in memberManager, the logic maybe used in other place. When we want to use the logic, didn't inject memberManager.

replies.bodyText: Too Many static method and object will caused over-coupling, and hard to modified and refactor
